headline: Inquiry in Leak May Put Focus Back on Comey
abstract: An inquiry into years-old disclosures of classified information is highly unusual and leaves law enforcement officials open to accusations of politicizing their work.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” Federal prosecutors in Washington are investigating a years-old leak of classified information about a Russian intelligence document, and they appear to be focusing on whether the former F.B.I. director James B. Comey illegally provided details to reporters, according to people familiar with the inquiry.
keywords: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates
